title: Sifetti

cover.alt: Some labels, with one of them selected

summary: A note-taking app where instead of putting things into folders, you filter by tags you create.
long_summary: A note-taking app where instead of putting things into folders, you filter by tags you create. Created because I've always wanted to put one thing into multiple folders.

gallery.alt: Many notes for different characters and places are arranged in a grid.
Notes are filtered, showing only those tagged "Mimba Isle" and "NPC".
